title: Feature Request: Switch to having input be run in command-line
description:
example usage:

user: Create a hello world HTML page.
assistant: Calls tools and creates HTML page. Tells user to open the page
user: Enters 'open index.html' and enters special key to send to terminal/shell instead of LLM. 
output: STDOUT/STDERR stream is output to screen as ConsoleBubble
